titleStmt.title: The dangerous rule, or, A sermon preached at Clonmel in the province of Munster in Ireland, upon Aug. 3, 1657 before the reverend judges for that circuit by S.L., Master in Arts, and lately fellow of C.C.C. in Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Ladyman, Samuel, 1625-1684.
J. E.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Tho. Newberry,
